long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximizing talent acquisition is key for any organization.

Wintro is designed to empower both employees and recruiters to tap into the rich potential of their LinkedIn networks. With our intuitive Companion Chrome Extension, you can effortlessly synchronize your LinkedIn contacts, enabling a smooth recruitment workflow.

For recruiters, Wintro becomes an indispensable tool to access a broader pool of qualified candidates by leveraging the networks of employees and other recruiters. It simplifies the process of identifying potential candidates and facilitates warm introductions, making the talent acquisition process more personal and effective.

Installation is quick and user-friendly. Sign up and integrate the Wintro Companion Chrome Extension to import your LinkedIn network within minutes. Easily flag contacts who are promising candidates for open positions, and streamline your recruitment strategy by harnessing the power of your professional network with Wintro.
